publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4631 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, for the purposes of debating motion S2M-4634 (Legislative Consent Memorandum (LCM(S2) 8.1) relating to the Compensation Bill - UK legislation) on Thursday 29 June 2006, the second sentence of Rule 9B.3.5 of Standing Orders be suspended. Supported by: George Lyon*
